long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UserWayâ€™s powerful screen reader gives users the ability to have web pages read to them on-demand. Ideal for anyone from visually impaired users to front-end and QA engineers checking ADA compliance and everyone in between.
